summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 6%) and rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 995 m), feels like temperature (up 2.1°C), outside temperature (up 1.8°C), and inside temperature (up 1.9°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 495.7m higher than yesterday, 388.4m lower than the past week, 994.7m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 765m and a high of 2220m, averaging 1761.4m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

Today’s average dew point temperature is 0.9°C lower than yesterday, 0.4°C higher than the past week, 0.6°C higher than the past month.

The dew point temperatures yesterday fell between 10.6°C minimum and 16.9°C maximum, with an average of 12.9°C; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 12.5°C and 12.3°C.

summary.summary: Inside; a mild and comfortable temperature is anticipated. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, humidity will be high and noticeable. Possible light showers, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
